name: Legal Grievance Redressal System
desc: Leveraging ML for auto-classification of complaints into legal categories, enriched with voice recognition and NLP for comprehensive analysis.

name: Forecasting Bank Customer Attrition
desc: Optimized accuracy with advanced ML models (Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, XGBoost) through feature engineering and hyperparameter tuning.

name: Stock Prediction
desc: Using LSTM for 85% accurate forecasts, featuring an interactive Plotly Dash interface for in-depth analysis of major stocks like Apple, Microsoft, and Facebook.

name: Cricket Data Analysis
desc: Leveraged data scraping and Pandas for insights, with a Power BI dashboard to identify top players and strategize team dynamics.

name: Analysis of Top YouTube Channels
desc: Utilized SQL for data preparation and Power BI for dynamic dashboards, revealing trends, audience insights, and content strategy correlations among top channels.

name: Climate Change Forecast
desc: Climate Change Prediction in Rio de Janeiro using Seasonal ARIMA Models for time series forecasting, analyzing historical patterns to predict future climate variations.
